  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_486</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_486</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Elementos básicos de Geometría del Espacio</string>
            <string language="en">Basic concepts in the geometry of three-dimensional space</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundmodelle in der Geometrie des 
dreidimensionalen Platzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concepts de base dans la géométrie de l'espace 
tridimensionnel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conceitos básicos na geometria do espaço 
tridimensional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Concetti di base nella geometria di spazio 
tridimensionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικές έννοιες στη γεωμετρία του τρισδιάστατου 
διαστήματος</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunos conceptos geométricos del espacio tridimensional. Se muestran, desde un punto de vista sintético, problemas de posiciones relativas de puntos, rectas y planos y se estudia el concepto de ángulo diedro y ángulo poliedro.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study some geometrical concepts in three-dimensional space. It shows problems relative to the positions of points, lines and planes from a synthetic point of view, and studies the concept of angle in dihedra and polyhedra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">problemas de incidencia</string>
            <string language="en">incidence problems</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recta</string>
            <string language="en">line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo poliedro</string>
            <string language="en">angle in a polyhedron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">tridimensional</string>
            <string language="en">three-dimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, einige geometrische Konzepte im dreidimensionalen Platz 
zu studieren. Er zeigt Probleme im Verhältnis zu den Positionen
der Punkte, der Zeilen und der Flächen von einem synthetischen 
Gesichtspunkt und studiert das Konzept des Winkels im dihedra und in 
den Polyedern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier quelques concepts géométriques dans l'espace 
tridimensionnel. Il montre des problèmes relativement aux 
positions des points, des lignes et des avions d'un point de vue 
synthétique, et étudie le concept de l'angle dans le dihedra et les 
polyèdres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
alguns conceitos geométricos no espaço tridimensional. Mostra 
problemas relativo às posições dos pontos, das linhas e dos planos 
de um ponto sintético da vista, e estuda o conceito do ângulo no 
dihedra e nos polyhedra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare alcuni concetti geometrici nello spazio tridimensionale. 
Mostra i problemi riguardante le posizioni dei punti, delle 
righe e degli aerei da un punto di vista sintetico e studia il 
concetto dell'angolo in dihedra e nei poliedri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει μερικές γεωμετρικές έννοιες στο τρισδιάστατο 
διάστημα. Εμφανίζει προβλήματα σχετικά με τις θέσεις των 
σημείων, των γραμμών και των αεροπλάνων από συνθετική άποψη, και
μελετά την έννοια της γωνίας στο dihedra και polyhedra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Probleme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel in einem Polyeder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dreidimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">problèmes d'incidence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">avion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle dans un polyèdre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tridimensionnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">problemas da incidência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">plano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo em um polyhedron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tridimensional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tridimensionale</string>
          </keyword>
